scripts.prepare:mainnet: node scripts/prepareERC20s.js mainnet && mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: node scripts/prepareERC20s.js rinkeby && mustache config/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ candybox-dev-rinkeby
